Type.Name: Executor

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Executor extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: This class provides a collection of methods that can be used to invoke a compiler, typically from an implementation.

block.para: This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. For more information, see Link Demands.

summary.para: Provides command execution functions for invoking compilers. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExecWait (string cmd, System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection tempFiles);
.method public static hidebysig void ExecWait(string cmd, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection tempFiles) cil managed

summary.para: Executes the command using the specified temporary files and waits for the call to return.

returns.para: The return value from the compiler.

Docs.param: The command to execute.
A with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.
